plot: Danny, an on-going heroin addict, has hit rock bottom with life. His brother and sister make one last attempt to save their misguided brother, before it's too late.
title: Addict
plot_es: Danny, an on-going heroin addict, has hit rock bottom with life. His brother and sister make one last attempt to save their misguided brother, before it's too late.
plot_en: Danny, an on-going heroin addict, has hit rock bottom with life. His brother and sister make one last attempt to save their misguided brother, before it's too late.
